original: intros m Phi relH. unfold KRIPKE. split. - intros contra. destruct relH as [R Hrel]. pose proof (proj2 (im_bij rel) m Phi R) as Hinj. apply Hinj in Hrel. rewrite Hrel. auto. - intros HinjFF. apply proj1 in relH. rewrite relH in HinjFF. auto.
